metaTags.metaDescription: Traditional solutions just aren't designed to fulfill the Internet's basic needs: security, performance, and reliability. Modernize your network approach.

relatedBlades.title: Modern security and performance
relatedBlades.subtitle: Protect & accelerate networks
relatedBlades.copy: Traditional solutions just aren't designed to fulfill the Internet's basic needs: security, performance, and reliability. Modernize your network approach.

features.title: Ultra-low time to mitigate
features.description: A vast library of known attacks and malicious traffic is identified at a Cloudflare data center closest to the source within seconds.

features.title: Traffic acceleration
features.description: With every bit we move, the network gets smarter and faster. Integrated with Argo Smart Routing, Cloudflare will deliver clean, fast traffic back to your network.

features.title: Connect, secure, accelerate
features.description: Get Cloudflare's built-in services — like DDoS mitigation, branch connectivity, software-defined Zero-Trust, firewalling — on a single global network.

addOns.entryTitle: Solution hub: Protect & accelerate networks - Transform corporate networks
addOns.title: Transform corporate networks

content.value: Get a Zero Trust network-as-a-service platform that dynamically connects users to enterprise resources, with identity-based security controls delivered close to users

callToAction.elementName: Solution hub: Protect & accelerate networks - Transform corporate networks - CTA Button

content.value: Cloudflare optimizes security and performance for Zalando with Magic Transit for fast, accurate customer fulfillment.
Protecting an internal network critical to customer fulfillment operations with Magic Transit

Zalando's enterprise network connects their fulfillment centers, the fashion store, outlet retail locations, and company headquarters. If their network were to go offline, a cascade of problems could ensue.

Cloudflare Magic Transit — a cloud-based solution using Cloudflare's global network — protects entire IP subnets from DDoS attacks while also accelerating network traffic. It also enhances productivity and reduces operational costs while blocking 200 potential attacks for Zalando each week.

related_asset.title: Solution Hub - Case Study - Zalando Logo

content.value: "Cloudflare Magic Transit is a 'set it and forget it' DDoS solution, which is exactly what we needed.
We're a busy team, and we don't have time for a tool that requires constant oversight."

features.title: Cloudflare DDoS Named A 'Leader' in The Forrester Wave™
features.description: According to Forrester, 'Cloudflare protects against DDoS from the edge, and fast,' and 'customer references view Cloudflare's edge network as a compelling way to protect and deliver applications.'

features.title: Blibli & Cloudflare
features.description: Blibli mitigates DDoS and bot attacks and secures its workspace with Cloudflare Zero Trust solutions.

features.title: Visma & Cloudflare
features.description: Cloudflare and Visma Enterprise team up to enable protection with Cloudflare Magic Transit, which provides DDoS protection for network infrastructure. After activating Magic Transit, Visma Enterprise saw immediate effects.
